origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RetailTrendAPI.get_trends', 'description': 'This function provides retail consumption trends based on the sector, time frame, and region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of retail, e.g., clothing, electronics.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the trend analysis, e.g., yearly, quarterly.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical region for the analysis.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'The consumption trends for the specified sector, time frame, and region.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 RetailTrendAPI.get_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'clothing', 'timeFrame'是'yearly', 'region'是'North America'.
